headline: Microsoft, Other Software Stocks Report Earnings Soon. Here’s How to Trade It.
summary: The problem is that the market is worried about long-term growth,  especially for the hundreds of smaller firms that provide businesses with niche software products that could face competition from artificial intelligence.  Products from companies such as OpenAI and Anthropic could eventually have business applications, which could make any given software company’s business obsolete one day down the line.  The silver lining is that this sets up an opportunity to buy some beaten-down software stocks.

headline: Oracle (ORCL) Is Down 11.1% After AI Debt Disclosure Lawsuit Raises Questions About Funding Model
summary: In recent weeks, Oracle has come under pressure after bondholders filed a proposed class-action lawsuit alleging the company did not fully disclose the scale of additional debt it would seek to fund its AI infrastructure build-out, even as it secured a multiyear, very large cloud commitment from OpenAI. These events highlight a tension at the heart of Oracle’s AI push: substantial new long-term contracts are arriving alongside mounting questions about leverage, disclosure, and the durability...

headline: OpenAI to Cover Data-Center Power Costs Amid Mounting Pressure
summary: OpenAI said it would pay higher electricity prices for the giant data centers it is building across the U.S., the tech industry’s latest pledge to address fears about rising utility costs and community disruptions.  OpenAI’s promise follows a similar commitment from its biggest investor, Microsoft, which drew praise from President Trump after rolling out a plan to make sure its data centers benefit local communities.  A big part of the framework is covering any increase in power costs resulting from new data centers.

headline: Is Oracle (ORCL) Fairly Priced After Recent Share Price Pullback And Cloud Growth Focus
summary: If you are wondering whether Oracle's current share price reflects its long term potential, it helps to step back and look closely at what you are paying for today. The stock last closed at US$179.92, with a 7 day return of an 11.1% decline, a 30 day return of a 6.3% decline and a 1 year return of 5.3%, while the 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 107.9% and 211.8% respectively. Recent news coverage has focused on Oracle's role as a major software and cloud player, with investors watching how...

headline: OpenAI unveils plan to keep data-center energy costs in check
summary: OpenAI unveiled a Stargate Community plan on Tuesday, aimed at "paying its way on ​energy" and ensuring that its operations do not ‌raise electricity costs for local communities.  Stargate is a $500 billion, multi-year initiative ‌to build AI data centers for training and inference, backed by major investors including Oracle.  U.S. President Donald Trump supported the initiative when it was first announced in ⁠January 2025.
